data.text: Wuphukisa, a Nzambi,
Ndilembo diami mu nyamba wungolo ;
Mbeni vonga mu diambu di telanga lusadusu
Bobo bakundendanga mu kambu bila
Ngeyo zebi buvungisi buama, a Nzambi
Bika batu bobo bantulanga diana mu ngeyo babika fua tsoni
Bila mu diambu diaku ndinkininina lenzo
Ndieka nzenza kuidi bakhomba ziama ;
Bila luzolo mu diambu di nzo aku lulembo nzinisa.
Bu ndieti dila ayi ndieti kifuisa nzala
Bu ndieti vuata tsaku,
Bobo bavuendi va muelo, minu bansekinina
Vayi, kuidi ngeyo, ndieti sambila, a Yave ;
Wuthotula mu nyamba, kadi tala ti ndidiama.
Kadi tala ti khuka yi nlangu yimbina
Bika wuphana mvutu Yave
Kadi suekila kisadi kiaku zizi kiaku ;
Fikama ayi wukhudi ;
Ngeyo zebi buevi ndidi wulenzo,
Nlenzo wukosikisidi ntimꞌama
Batudidi biyimbu mu bidia biama,
Bika meza batula va ntualꞌawu yikituka dikondi
Bika meso mawu maba mu tombi
Wuba dukuidila miangu miaku mi ngolo
Bika buangu kiawu kikitunga dikanga
Bila balembo yamisa batu bobo wulueka ;
Wuba yekudila mambimbi va yilu mambimbi
Bika bakubulu mu buku yi luzingu,
Ndidi mu phasi ayi mu mabienga
Ndiela zitisanga dizina di Nzambi mu nkunga,
Buna diodi diela luta monisa Yave khini
Nsukami wela mona ayi wela yangalala ;
Yave weti wila nsukami
Bika Diyilu ayi ntoto binzitisa,
Bila Nzambi wela vukisa Sioni,
Mela ba kiuka ki bana ba bisadi biandi,
